title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published on PyPI as `ollama`.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as `ollama`.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models via the `langchain-ollama` PyPI package.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed to Open WebUI).

title: Open WebUI (formerly ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured, self-hosted web interface for Ollama and OpenAI-compatible APIs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, published on npm.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing GitHub-Copilot-like completions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API for Rails applications.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset for using Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to Ollama and returns replies.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron-based desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for generating code and chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated registry of Modelfile recipes for popular LLMs.
